title: Colin Berry is up with an interesting posting about 3D enhancement

author: jenx
post: I’m enamored with Ms Piczek’s work, returning to her analysis suggesting the image was ejected onto the shroud as a quantum hologram during the time of explosion of the event horizons, pointing out the lack of entropy, gravity and negative image. Thanks for posting this video Dan, I haven’t seen it..
title: 1999 Interview with Isabel Piczek

author: jenx
post: Ehboy. I know one fact, I need to invest in coffee and doughnut shop! Ha! I see the evidence yes. But with all due respect, I’m just an intelligent lay person finding it very difficult to program, reprogram, program…. Based on so much information, inconsistencies and variables from one source to the next. It seems to me many push opinions as facts based on spiritual beliefs or lack thereof. I do appreciate your work. I think I need to absorb this..
